attributes.action: help us fight for the approval of treatment for vimizim for the morquio patients
attributes.background:
My 3 year old daughter is suffering from an Incurable disease called Morquio syndrome.
NICE and NHS England are depriving her and other morquio sufferers of the treatment drug needed called VIMIZIM 
Without this drug there is no hope ! 
Please Show your support & 
please sign this petition

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104559

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way. 10,000 signatures has guaranteed a response from the government.
